system.summary: (Cloth/Leatherworking Only) Create a piece of cloth or leather armor.

description.value: If your specialization is in leatherworking or cloth work, you can craft one piece of non-magical leather or cloth armor. So long as you have relevant materials equal to ¾ of the armor’s cost, you can work on creating the item over the course of multiple rests. Each Rest Action you spend working on it, make an Intelligence (Craft) check against DC 10. Each success counts as 1 completed work session, a failure does not. Depending on the item’s actual cost, it takes more work sessions to complete (see @Compendium[undertaking.tables.WS5UX4KFBB0PAZAE]{Craft Artisanal} table).
